alert.note: Alert for Berks; Bucks; Lehigh; Montgomery (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 1:19PM EDT until July 25 at 1:45PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL BERKS...SOUTH CENTRAL LEHIGH...NORTHWESTERN MONTGOMERY AND WEST CENTRAL BUCKS COUNTIES... At 118 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Green Lane, or 20 miles south of Allentown, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Wind damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... Perkasie, Souderton, Collegeville, Trappe, East Greenville, Schwenksville, Bally, Green Lane, Geryville, Spring Mount, Gilbertsville, Skippack, Telford, Sellersville, Boyertown, Pennsburg, Red Hill, Trumbauersville, Silverdale and Harleysville. This includes Northeast Extension between mile markers 32 and 42. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
